front.title: RTP Payload for SMPTE ST 291-1 Ancillary Data

abstract.t: This memo describes a real-time transport protocol (RTP) payload format for the Society of Motion Picture and Television Engineers (SMPTE) Ancillary data, as defined by SMPTE ST 291-1. SMPTE Ancillary data is generally used along with professional video formats to carry a range of ancillary data types, including time code, Closed Captioning, and the Active Format Description (AFD).
